question:
In a certain class,  5/12 of all the students are girls and  1/4 of all the students are girls who take Spanish. What fraction of the girls take Spanish?
(A) \(\frac{5}{48}\)
(B) \(\frac{5}{12}\)
(C) \(\frac{2}{5}\)
(D) \(\frac{3}{5}\)
(E) \(\frac{7}{12}\)
Show
Hide

answer_choices:
